colorScheme.description: You can choose between two schemes available in this website.

language.description: You can choose between four languages available in this website.

pointer.description: Whether or not to use a custom pointer on this session.

discord.warning: I'm an active member of a few Discord communities, and I am always open for new conversations and meeting new people!

home.pageDescription: Your average autistic compeer discovering solace in the intricate workings of philosophy and the binary labyrinth of computer science.
home.introduction: A geek on the autism spectrum exploring the profound intricacies of physics, software, and linguistics.

aboutMe.title: About me
aboutMe.text: Hi there! I'm a Brazilian high-schooler with a passion for exploring the intricacies of various fields, including computer science, philosophy, physics, mathematics, and linguistics. I was fascinated by technology from a young age and started my journey with my first computer at the age of three. As I've grown, I've also developed a deep interest in self-development and understanding the complexities of the human existence and the universe we live.

artists.title: Artists
artists.text: Discover artists and bands that perfectly align with my personal taste and high-quality standards.
artists.glassBeach: An American indie rock band from Los Angeles.
artists.yuce: Soloist singer, DJ, lyricist, composer and arranger.
artists.kikuo: A producer with steady popularity. His songs are known for having dark subjects paired with upbeat music.
artists.tom: A primary force behind the creation of the bossa nova style, and his songs have been performed by many singers and instrumentalists internationally since the early 1960s.
artists.chico: Brazilian singer-songwriter, guitarist, composer, playwright, writer, and poet. He is best known for his music, which often includes social, economic, and cultural reflections on Brazil.

books.title: Books
books.text: Good reads about computer science, advanced mathematics, compilers, lexers, concepts of philosophy, and more.
books.sf: A broad introduction to the mathematical underpinnings of reliable software.
books.ci: Everything you need to implement a full-featured, efficient scripting language.
books.linguagensFormais: [Portuguese] This book aims to present the basic concepts of the Theory of Formal Languages. It is based on teaching experiences in the Computer Science Bachelor Course at UFRGS.
